channel.title: Action problems
channel.description: I just downloaded moparscape v 3.2 and in the game i can't use any of the actions like if i right click a door and hit open door it won't do it at all and i can't use the cannon too. Also when i kill a monster it strechs out really far and i can kill all of them in one hit. AND even if i have all the runes i need to cast a spell it won't let cast it. How do i fix all these problems? ( i would have screenies to show u but im on my laptop so it doesn't have a printscreen butten on it)

item.title: Action problems
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

You need to code it, but Moparscape isn’t your server :o

Read full topic

item.title: Action problems
